title: Duntulm Castle Walk Route

images.title: Peter Trant / Duntulm Castle
images.caption: The ruins of Duntulm Castle in Trotternish, with Tulm Island just offshore and the Outer Hebrides in the distance

images.title: John Allan / Duntulm Castle
images.caption: There is not much left of the ruins of the castle any more, but its defensive location remains impressive. Seen here from the path to Rubha Hunish, looking over the cleared village of Erisco.

images.title: Paul Mc Ilroy / Duntulm Castle  (ruin)
images.caption: This shot was taken from the Duntulm Castle hotel

description: Visit the fascinating ruins of this 14th century coastal castle and enjoy wonderful views of Tulm Bay on this walk in Trotternish. There is a parking area just off the A855 with a footpath leading to the castle ruins. The castle is surrounded by dramatic cliffs with wonderful views over Tulm Bay and Duntulm Bay. The ruins and surrounding scenery are quite striking and very photogenic.
